p-0: Not sure what to tokenize? Here is a shortlist of types of assets that can be converted into tokens and crypto-stock shares.
p-1: PLEASE NOTE: the value of your token will be virtual, and fixed to the value of your company's designated assets. You are NOT putting up your assets--you are simply using your company assets to secure the virtual value of the cryptostock token.
p-2: Your company assets serve as collateral for your subsequent trades. Once you have created your token, only you decide how much you want to trade those shares on the blockchain and when, with the shares themselves treading on the value of your assets. CCS offers strategic advice and execution of trades as you see fit, according to your needs and customer preferences at all times.
p-3: Now, the general list of tokenizable assets:
p-8:
Access to current service or product
Access to future service or product
Gold mining
Gem mining
Oil and gas exploration
Telecom
Transport
Energy
Infrastructure
Industry
Manufacturing
Finance
p-10: Payment or currency token                                                                                                                Asset backed currency token
